body: The first story was like a warm bowl of mushroom soup and garlic bread for my soul.
Dang that last story was dark as fuck but that made me read it for a second time to really understand the story.

The first story was amazing, the ending was kinda meh but it had really wholesome moments as well. I also love the fact his step sis didn't give up on him even when his parents did. The rest of the stories were just meh and the last story was fucking stupid, I would've been fine if he would've fucked that demon but nah.

@SatchPangit It was three times... The original time...the first wish...and the second wish...that's three times. I don't understand him vanishing, though. It should have just killed him, taking his soul like that...not made him vanish completely. Then again...that would have probably been tragic for the step-sister to find her beloved onii-chan dead. It's still tragic now, though, that she can't even remember him. Wish there was more with her somehow remembering him and making a wish, herself, for him to come back... This story is just so out of place with how the others had happy endings... :(
Step-sister, vanilla, defloration, virgin, true love, happy ending = perfect...except that last story.
And correction, lad. You only took the virginity of your sister twice as for the 3rd rewind (3rd wish) you got erased from existence.
WTF! is that last story...he just wished for her sister to be sane and be a virgin again but he totally disappeared from existence as time rewind a year back.
WTF happened in the last story?
I like it how every story arc suddenly hits you like a train at the end. But man is this sweet af.
I envy this mangaka's husband. She's into that kinky shit.
I liked the story where the girl is so supportive and motherly
so that apartment building is an (not) incest magnet
That last story I'm in tears 😂😂😂
The first story arc is great, the rest is just meh.
